=== Introduction ===
This page describe the installation issues with the following dpkg error: 

`<code>cannot access archive: No such file or directory</code>' 

as described in bug Bug:523395 .

=== Description ===
Circumstances under which this error occurs are yet undefined.

Possible sources of the problem:
* Access to an archive located on a CD/DVD ?
* system crash (delayed allocation fs ?)
* apt-cacher-ng

==== How to reproduce ====
???

==== Workaround ====
Propose a workaround
